byoa wants you to own data and own experiences. 

NFTs are either the perfect building block or the perfect proof of concept for this.  

With the mallows/byoa launch if we can just get more builders in the space thinking this way, 2022 will bring great things! 

/end

Traditional IOT applications/devices lead you to believe you own your experience or are in control. But theyre literally block boxes from corps hell bent to accumulate more data on you.

Now data isn't bad in itself, but when it's a black box and you have no access... thats ğŸ‘
4/

You should own your user experiences and web3 makes this more possible than ever. Immutability. Ownership. Transparency. IOT (ironically and unintended play on traditional IOT - Internet of Things).

byoa is a building block that makes this possible. The real IOT.

3/

Looking forward to launch next week and getting everything out in open source land so people can start using, but more importantly building.

2/

This will be a milestone achievement for the mallows team and @RyanBerckmans one of the originators of byoa!

I expect 2022 to be a breakout year for NFTs and smart contracts to be used a homes for distributed immutable applications which the user owns.
